title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description:
1. Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor.
2. Currently, it takes a long time (30 sec in my case) to update the checked state of the table.

NOTES:
- Busy cursor should be shown during the update process.
OB: It takes a long time (30 sec in my case) to update the checked state of the table. Busy cursor should be shown.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the table where checkboxes are present.
3. Check or uncheck the checkboxes.
4. Observe the time it takes to update the checked state of the table and whether the busy cursor is shown during the update process.
